title: Customized Query Criteria
content: The conditions attribute can be used to customize search criteria. The built-in text box of the gadget supports the function of pressing Enter to trigger search.

title: Drag Window
content: Sets the drag feature of the pop-up window through the draggable property. The default value is true, indicating that you can drag the window on the title bar. If this parameter is set to false, the window cannot be dragged.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Cannot be cleared
content: The show-clear-btn attribute is used to set whether the content can be cleared.

title: Full-screen display
content: You can set resize to determine whether to display the content in full screen.

title: Table Edit
content: gridOp: This parameter is valid only when popseletor is set to grid. Currently, columns and data data sources can be configured. For details about the configuration items, see the Grid table component. The textField and valueField fields must be configured at the same time.

title: Width
content: The width are configured through the width attribute. Use dialog-class to customize the pop-up window class name

title: Custom Icon
content: You can use the icon attribute to customize the component icon. You need to import the corresponding svg icon.

title: Multiple Choices
content: You can set multi to true to implement multiple selections. Set show-history to set whether to display tables on the History tab page when tables are configured on the pop-up panel. The default value is false.

title: tabindex of the text box
content: The tabindex attribute is used to determine whether the focus can be obtained by pressing Tab and the focus sequence. This parameter is valid only when the readonly attribute is set to false.

title: Display Field Mapping
content: Use the text-field attribute to set the fields displayed by the widget.

title: Submit Field Mapping
content: The value-field attribute is used to set the fields submitted by the component to the background.

title: Custom Title
content: The title attribute is used to set the title of the pop-up window. The internationalization information is supported.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Remote Search
content: The remote-search attribute is used to configure remote search. In the remoteSearch method, the conditions search conditions can be sent to the background. After the background processes the data, the data can be properly displayed on the page.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Paging
content:
The

showPager attribute is valid only when popseletor is set to grid. The default value is false. Pagination is not enabled. If this parameter is set to true, you need to configure the pagerOp attribute. In addition, you need to listen to the page-change event to change the data data source

of the gridOp
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Rendering Query
content: If the first batch of data loaded by the component does not contain the data corresponding to the currently set value, You can set text-render-source to perform reverse query
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Enabling Tree Mode
content: Enable the tree mode through the popseletor attribute. Then the tree-op attribute is the op configuration mode of the Tree component.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Single choice in tree mode
content: Enable the tree mode through the popseletor attribute. Then the tree-op attribute is the op configuration mode of the Tree component.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Edit box size
content: Sets the size of the PopEditor edit box through the size attribute. The options are medium, small, and mini.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Data beyond hidden
content:
Configure the showOverflow attribute on the data column to set the display and hiding of the data when the data exceeds the column width. Values can be of type Boolean or String, with three values to choose from, as shown below. By default, all content is displayed in a new line.

optional value description

tooltip: The extra part is displayed...., and all information is displayed on the left or right. title: The value is the same as the title attribute of the native tag. ellipsis: '...' is displayed, and no message is displayed. true: If the value is true, the effect is the same as that of the tooltip.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Mode of triggering a single selection
content: When a single option is selected, you can only click the option button to select it by default. You can also set trigger to row to select any position in the row. Alternatively, set trigger to cell and click any position in the Operation column to select it.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Set History tab
content: When a table is configured on the pop-up panel, configure show-history to set whether to display the table on the History tab page. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Remote Data Request
content: Configure the auto-lookup to false, set initialization to not request data, or call this $ref.popuptor.handleSearch() Proactively calls the request method
findIntroStr: This component can only select data in the pop-up panel. Data cannot be manually entered. The tree or grid component is displayed in the pop-up panel.

title: Associative query
content: Configure the suggest to enable the association function, automatically triggering association queries after input in the input box; This function needs to be used in conjunction with remoteSearch.
